locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Kids Shape Color
locale.subtitle: Learn shapes and colors
locale.description: This is an application to help children learn the shape and color quickly. Contains a dozen common shapes: triangular, square, rectangular, trapezoidal, rhombic, round, oval, round, heart-shaped Pentagon, pentagram, etc.; a dozen colors: red, blue, yellow, green, orange, orange, pink, purple, grey, brown, black, white, etc.. Let the child remember and distinguish the shapes and colors quickly in the fun and intuitive drag objects. The game consists of three modes: shape, color, shape, and color combination mode, each of which contains more than 50 levels.
locale.promotional_text: Recognition of shape color baby happy learning and growth

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 儿童学形状和颜色-快乐学习成长
locale.subtitle: 学会各种形状颜色
locale.description: 这是一款帮助孩子快速学习形状和颜色的应用! 包含十几种常见的形状：三角形, 正方形, 长方形, 菱形, 梯形, 圆, 椭圆, 半圆, 五边形, 五角星, 心形等；十几种颜色: 红色, 蓝色, 黄色, 绿色, 橙色, 橙色, 粉色, 紫色, 灰色, 棕色, 黑色, 白色等。让孩子在有趣和直观的拖动物体过程中快速记住和分辨出这些形状和颜色。 游戏包括三种模式：形状，颜色，形状和颜色组合模式，每个模式包含有50多个关卡。
locale.promotional_text: 认形状学颜色宝宝快乐学习成长

keywords.keyword: 阳阳爱写字魔力小孩过年宝宝学写字中华恐龙园汉字与书法海绵宝宝做汉堡朵拉历险记学做饭宝宝爱洗澡三字经读写版宝宝书孕育跟我学写汉字蓝猫学拼音小嘀削削serato自由诵读经典儿歌巴巴熊巴巴宝贝熊孩子钢笔书法
